home.title: Sanan — communicates openly and often
home.description: I enjoy discussing challenges and resources, and working together to tackle the most important problems first.
home.aboutDescription1: I'm passionate about tackling the technical challenges that arise in problem-solving. As a problem solver, I collaborate to define issues across the service and user experience, and I don't hesitate to roll up my sleeves—whatever the role or tool—to resolve them.
home.aboutDescription2: I currently serve as a developer and tech lead at HUSTLERS Corp.
